title: Wind wall on yasuo stops Vel koz E
body: The Vel Koz E is coming from underground, I think the Wind wall shoud not stop it. I see this in my game and the E of Vel Koz simply disapear. Can you fix that pls

replies.body: I thought velkoz e was like a cho knock up
It's not a bug. Vel'Koz's E shoots a little orb at the targeted area where the knock up happens. Wind Wall destroys the orb.

Windwall only blocks projectiles.  Non-projectiles are not blocked _even if they are animated to look like a projectile for character style and lore purposes_, see {{champion:115}} Ult.

Vel'koz E is a Ground targeted AoE ability and like all the other abilities in this category, should not be blocked by Windwall in the same way as Taliyah's Seismic Shove, Syndra's Dark Sphere, Xerath's Rite of the Arcane,  Brand's Pillar of Flame, etc.

The same way Vel'koz's E has functioned for the** past two years.**
Yet it doesn't block syndra q which is technically the same thing.

Wouldn't say it's the same thing. Syndra's Q kind of just pops kinda like Cassiopeia's Q or Karthus' Q.
Velkoz's E extends/shoots. But I agree that it shouldnt block.

or just remove windwall
it isbone of the most broken ability in the game and will never be balanced.
Syndra's E onto a Q is what should be blocked, not her Q itself.
I think it is coming from Vel himself like an orb or something and flies toward the targeted ground. I am more concerned about Windwall not stopping flying champs from moving.

> [{quoted}](name=Fives55555,realm=EUNE,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=azwuhw1T,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-05-11T14:50:20.690+0000)
>
>  I am more concerned about Windwall not stopping flying champs from moving.

As reasonable as this is, it would make it too op of an ability. It would be like somewhat of an outward poppy E that blocks skillshots.
Just imagine how much it would counter Tristana. She's already ranged + she can't jump through his wall
Vel'Koz fires a projectile at the target area to cause the explosion and knock-up. It's intended.

Windwall as a base skill is defo up there as one of the stupidest design ideas Riot has ever had. 

I'm pretty positive it isn't a bug. I'm also pretty positive it is still retarded.
Welcome to the exciting world of ulting with {{champion:201}}
It isn't a bug. One of the many reason why Yasuo Wind Wall is probably the most OP things ingame.

All of Velkoz's basic abilities are skillshots, regardless of what the actually look like. His E is just like Braum's Ult, so both are stopped by WIndwall.

EDIT: His E is the knockup? That's even easier; that ability is a ground-targeted skillshot. You can even see the particle as it travels forward.
